publ: by The Best Darn Girl Movie Reviews
name: TheBestDarnGirlsMovieReviews
0:
”Alexa Open The Best Darn Girls”
”Alexa launch The Best Darn Girls”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the best darn girls
des:
This app will give the latest 5 reviews from The Best Darn Girls website. You can give reviews from movies "In The Theater", "Made For TV", "Video On Demand", or "In Stores". Each description will give a quick plot overview, a brief critique, and a rating out of 5 stars. "In the Theater" are movies currently being shown in movie theaters. "Made For TV" are movies airing only on TV (i.e. Hallmark, HBO, Lifetime, etc). "Video On Demand" is videos that premiere on Netflix or Prime Video. And "In Stores" is 'in theater movies' that received a score of 4 or more stars that are for sale in stores. And now, Alexa will put that movie in your cart upon request. Enjoy. If you have any comments, questions, or concerns, email them to thebestdarngirls@gmail.com.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app. This skill currently makes Alexa Shopping available only in the US.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
